titles.title: To reliquidate certain entries of salmon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/2/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate, without assessment of antidumping duties or interest, specified entries of salmon at the port of Miami, Florida. Requires refund of any antidumping duties or interest previously paid on such entries.
